name: Redemption Arc
description:
Redemption Arc was made for Mini Jam 120: Hell  
Limitation: The Player Cannot Harm.

STORY

You just died and find yourself in the bad place. Before facing judgement you try to commit as many good deeds as possible to get your very own Redemption Arc (Because everyone loves redemption arcs)! Fortunetly there are many demons who could desperatly need your help.

GAMEPLAY

A|D - Move Left and Right
S - Crouch
Space - Jump
Shift - Dash 
F - InteractAlt - Use Item
Q|E - Select Previous/Next Item

CREDITS

Stegoratops - Programming, Level Design
Xanashea - Character Design
Soelna - Environment Art
